context_bundle.summary: Algorithm efficiency & Big O optimization. Divide-and-conquer (O(n log n)), dynamic programming (memoization), greedy algorithms. Common complexities: O(1) hash lookup, O(log n) binary search, O(n) linear, O(n²) nested loops.

onboarding.quick_start: Big O = time/space complexity. O(1) best (constant), O(log n) good (binary search), O(n) acceptable (linear), O(n²) bad (nested loops), O(2^n) terrible (exponential). Optimize: divide-conquer, dynamic programming, memoization.
common_patterns: Divide-conquer: Merge sort O(n log n) vs bubble sort O(n²)
Dynamic programming: Fibonacci O(n) with memo vs O(2^n) naive
Hash table: O(1) lookup vs O(n) array search
Binary search: O(log n) vs O(n) linear search

known_errors.error: Algorithm too slow on large datasets
known_errors.solution: Analyze Big O, replace with O(n log n) or better algorithm
known_errors.prevention: Profile before deploying, test with realistic data sizes
